-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Mathematical/physical/chemical constants
--   
--   <a>Science.Constants.Dimensional</a> is a variant of
--   <a>Science.Constants</a>[1] package, with the only difference is that
--   that the dimensional flavor provides (where applicable)
--   dimensionally-typed constants. The <a>Numeric.Units.Dimensional</a>[2]
--   wrappers allow to write type-safe formulas, for example all of this
--   will successfully type-check:
--   
--   <pre>
--   ~$ ghci -XNoImplicitPrelude
--   
--   </pre>
@package science-constants-dimensional
@version 0.1.0.1


-- | Private Functions
module Science.Constants.Dimensional.Private

-- | This is a compile-time check function, it ensures that the first
--   argument has the Unit-type of the second argument.
(~~) :: Quantity d a -> Unit d a -> Quantity d a


-- | Dimensional Scientific Constants
module Science.Constants.Dimensional
planckConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos Zero)) (Pos Zero) (Neg Zero) Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double
plancksConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos Zero)) (Pos Zero) (Neg Zero) Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double
reducedPlanckConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos Zero)) (Pos Zero) (Neg Zero) Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double
reducedPlancksConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos Zero)) (Pos Zero) (Neg Zero) Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double
planckConstantOver2Pi :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos Zero)) (Pos Zero) (Neg Zero) Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double
plancksConstantOver2Pi :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos Zero)) (Pos Zero) (Neg Zero) Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double
hbar :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos Zero)) (Pos Zero) (Neg Zero) Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double
hslash :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos Zero)) (Pos Zero) (Neg Zero) Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double
speedOfLight :: Quantity (Dim (Pos Zero) Zero (Neg Zero) Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double
vacuumPermeability :: Quantity (Dim (Pos Zero) (Pos Zero) (Neg (Neg Zero)) (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero Zero Zero) Double
permeabilityOfFreeSpace :: Quantity (Dim (Pos Zero) (Pos Zero) (Neg (Neg Zero)) (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero Zero Zero) Double
magneticConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Pos Zero) (Pos Zero) (Neg (Neg Zero)) (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero Zero Zero) Double
mu_0 :: Quantity (Dim (Pos Zero) (Pos Zero) (Neg (Neg Zero)) (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero Zero Zero) Double
vacuumPermittivity :: Quantity (Dim (Neg (Neg (Neg Zero))) (Neg Zero) (Pos (Pos (Pos (Pos Zero)))) (Pos (Pos Zero)) Zero Zero Zero) Double
electricConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Neg (Neg (Neg Zero))) (Neg Zero) (Pos (Pos (Pos (Pos Zero)))) (Pos (Pos Zero)) Zero Zero Zero) Double
eps_0 :: Quantity (Dim (Neg (Neg (Neg Zero))) (Neg Zero) (Pos (Pos (Pos (Pos Zero)))) (Pos (Pos Zero)) Zero Zero Zero) Double
coulombsConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos (Pos Zero))) (Pos Zero) (Neg (Neg (Neg (Neg Zero)))) (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero Zero Zero) Double
coulombConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos (Pos Zero))) (Pos Zero) (Neg (Neg (Neg (Neg Zero)))) (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero Zero Zero) Double
electricForceConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos (Pos Zero))) (Pos Zero) (Neg (Neg (Neg (Neg Zero)))) (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero Zero Zero) Double
electrostaticConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos (Pos Zero))) (Pos Zero) (Neg (Neg (Neg (Neg Zero)))) (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero Zero Zero) Double
rydbergConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Neg Zero) Zero Zero Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double
rydbergsConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Neg Zero) Zero Zero Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double
avogadroConstant :: Quantity (Dim Zero Zero Zero Zero Zero (Neg Zero) Zero) Double
boltzmannConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos Zero)) (Pos Zero) (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero (Neg Zero) Zero Zero) Double
boltzmannsConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos Zero)) (Pos Zero) (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero (Neg Zero) Zero Zero) Double
molarGasConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos Zero)) (Pos Zero) (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero (Neg Zero) (Neg Zero) Zero) Double
idealGasConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos Zero)) (Pos Zero) (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero (Neg Zero) (Neg Zero) Zero) Double
universalGasConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos Zero)) (Pos Zero) (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero (Neg Zero) (Neg Zero) Zero) Double
molarMassConstant :: Quantity (Dim Zero (Pos Zero) Zero Zero Zero (Neg Zero) Zero) Double
gravitationalConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos (Pos Zero))) (Neg Zero) (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double
newtonConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos (Pos Zero))) (Neg Zero) (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double
newtonsConstant :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos (Pos Zero))) (Neg Zero) (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double
bigG :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos (Pos Zero))) (Neg Zero) (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double
standardAccelerationOfGravity :: Quantity (Dim (Pos Zero) Zero (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double
earthAccelerationOfGravity :: Quantity (Dim (Pos Zero) Zero (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double
atomicMassConstant :: Quantity DMass Double
atomicMassUnit :: Quantity DMass Double
dalton :: Quantity DMass Double
electronMolarMass :: Quantity (Dim Zero (Pos Zero) Zero Zero Zero (Neg Zero) Zero) Double
molarMassOfElectron :: Quantity (Dim Zero (Pos Zero) Zero Zero Zero (Neg Zero) Zero) Double
massOfElectron :: Quantity DMass Double
massOfProton :: Quantity DMass Double
elementaryCharge :: Quantity DElectricCharge Double
chargeOfProton :: Quantity DElectricCharge Double
chargeOfElectron :: Quantity DElectricCharge Double


-- | Short Names for Scientific Constants
module Science.Constants.Dimensional.Short

-- | Planck Constant
h :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos Zero)) (Pos Zero) (Neg Zero) Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double

-- | Reduced Planck Constant
_h :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos Zero)) (Pos Zero) (Neg Zero) Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double

-- | Vacuum Permittivity
e_0 :: Quantity (Dim (Neg (Neg (Neg Zero))) (Neg Zero) (Pos (Pos (Pos (Pos Zero)))) (Pos (Pos Zero)) Zero Zero Zero) Double

-- | Coulomb's Constant
k_e :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos (Pos Zero))) (Pos Zero) (Neg (Neg (Neg (Neg Zero)))) (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero Zero Zero) Double

-- | Boltzmann Constant
k_b :: Quantity (Dim (Pos (Pos Zero)) (Pos Zero) (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero (Neg Zero) Zero Zero) Double

-- | Standard Acceleration of Gravity (9.8...)
g :: Quantity (Dim (Pos Zero) Zero (Neg (Neg Zero)) Zero Zero Zero Zero) Double

-- | Atomic Mass Constant
amu :: Quantity DMass Double

-- | Mass of an Electron at Rest
m_e :: Quantity DMass Double

-- | Mass of a Proton
m_p :: Quantity DMass Double

-- | Charge of a Proton
q_p :: Quantity DElectricCharge Double

-- | Charge of an Electron
q_e :: Quantity DElectricCharge Double

-- | Tau (2*pi)
tau :: Quantity DPlaneAngle Double
